DOC.brief_summary: Intranasal fentanyl find safe effective reduction pain among pediatric adult population . The investigator hypothesize patient receive 100 mcg intranasal fentanyl pain control first-trimester uterine aspiration report low pain score receive placebo . The investigator test hypothesis use randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial comparing pain report uterine aspiration patient receive either intranasal fentanyl intranasal saline prior procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Intranasal Fentanyl Pain Control During First-Trimester Uterine Aspiration
